home.description: An integrated route to visibility, impact and growth.

aboutUs.description1: Billboard Way Inc. (BWI) is an integrated advertising and media company under ABC Prime Group, based in the Philippines.
aboutUs.description2: As the sister company of ACR Towers, BWI manages and operates both physical and digital media channels â€” from iconic LED facades and in-mall activations to property apps and e-commerce platforms.
aboutUs.description3: Our mission is to provide brands with an integrated route to visibility, impact, and growth by connecting every touchpoint in the customer.
aboutUs.description4: We combine prime on-site media resources with in-house digital platform development to deliver tailor-made marketing solutions that drive real results.
aboutUs.list1: - Headquartered in the Philippines, servicing ACR Towers and beyond
aboutUs.list2: - Managing both on-site and online advertising channels
aboutUs.list3: - Providing full-service media leasing, campaign execution, and platform development
